item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, November 4, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Cheap Thrills, an album cover by Robert Crumb (2020) (24 points | 7 comments)
2. Scientists glue two proteins together, driving cancer cells to self-destruct (384 points | 97 comments)
3. The history of Unix's ioctl and signal about window sizes (10 points | discuss)
4. An embarrassingly simple approach to recover unlearned knowledge for LLMs (144 points | 45 comments)
5. Project Sid: Many-agent simulations toward AI civilization (321 points | 95 comments)
6. Hertz-dev, the first open-source base model for conversational audio (167 points | 35 comments)
7. I've had a change of heart regarding employee metrics (269 points | 142 comments)
8. Touchscreens are out, and tactile controls are back (980 points | 681 comments)
9. A Hamiltonian Circuit for Rubik's Cube (73 points | 19 comments)
10. pg_flo – Stream, transform, and re-route PostgreSQL data in real-time (183 points | 27 comments)
11. Open-source wheeled biped robot (19 points | 7 comments)
12. GJS: Node.js Like Runtime for Gnome (36 points | 7 comments)
13. gptel: a simple LLM client for Emacs (128 points | 27 comments)
14. PacCam: Pac-Man controlled with your face (38 points | 6 comments)
15. Ritonavir Form III: A Coincidental Concurrent Discovery (11 points | 3 comments)
16. The Submerged Nabataean Temple in Puteoli at Pozzuoli, Italy (47 points | 12 comments)
17. Programming languages that blew my mind (2023) (255 points | 142 comments)

19. Top discoveries about ancient people from DNA in 2023 (66 points | 4 comments)
20. It's a Palworld After All a Lawyer Explains Nintendo vs. Palworld [video] (6 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: Tinder, but to Decide What to Eat (164 points | 155 comments)
22. Ask HN: What would you preserve if the internet were to go down tomorrow? (166 points | 202 comments)
23. Missing open-source contributor presents a dilemma when accepting their PR (71 points | 47 comments)
24. Venvstacks: Virtual Environment Stacks for Python (103 points | 48 comments)
25. Unix core utilities implemented in Haskell (224 points | 86 comments)
26. The performance of hashing for similar function detection (39 points | 1 comment)
27. Matrix 2.0 Is Here (274 points | 120 comments)
28. Big Data for the Leviathan (46 points | 7 comments)
29. Show HN: Replacicon – Create and customize app icons on macOS (32 points | 16 comments)
30. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) Is Hiring Back End and Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
